EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the customer when their location request has been rejected
EmailTemplate.name: Location rejected notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Location rejected for {!Case.Type_of_Zone__c} color curb
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
The SFMTA is unable to proceed with installation of your requested {!Case.Type_of_Zone__c} color curb at the location that you provided. However, we are able to continue with installation at a nearby location. Please review the location details below regarding the new location for your {!Case.Type_of_Zone__c} color curb:
{!Location__c.Survey_Tech_Installer_Notes__c}
Thank you, San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
